#summary User stories for JAKOB

Here you can see all the different user stories created for JAKOB. If you would like to create additional user stories, please read the [How_to_create_user_stories] section first.
=User stories=

  * As a *User* I want to collect attributes from different sources so the I can pass on more attributes to a service.
  * As an *Administrator* I want to easily set up a new attribute collection so that I do not have to code.
